website_summaries.verdict: A s'more maker for the oven that lets you cook six at once.
pros: Makes a lot of s'mores at one time
Kids can still enjoy making the s'mores by stacking the ingredients in the basket
Easy to wash. Can work in the oven or toaster oven
Latches closed to hold the ingredients together
cons: Does not work as well with the over-sized marshmallows

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy, and extend to a length that is safe ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I though this was a little much to spend on two sticks, but well worth it. They are very sturdy, and extend to a length that is safe for everyone to use. They also have nice tip covers for extra safety. They are great with kids, so fun to watch the changing colors. Great addition to campfire time. Would I buy another set? Definitely! Would I get them as a gift for friends, definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they liked it! It got back to me through the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift. I don't think they liked it! It got back to me through the 6 year old that his mom was mad because of the huge mess she had to clean up. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: Couch Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 14 year old boy who frequently has bonfires and campus at his house. It was partially a joke gift (as the picture on the packaging shows a child) but partly serious knowing he'd enjoy the novelty of it. He actually loved it and was excited to use it. He thought it was really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Monica F

customer_reviews.title: Roasting marshmallows never looked this good!
customer_reviews.text: These s'mores sticks are awesome! No more hunting around the woods for the perfect marshmallow roasting stick. The prongs are long enough for hot dogs as well. The LED lights are not just cool to look at (and fun for little ones), they also make it easy to find (and not step on) your sticks when you are siting around the campfire. Also, the inner part of the stick slides out to roasting length and slides back in to a length that would fit in your suitcase, so we'll be taking these with us on a plane trip later this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Simple Excitement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep in our camper. The kids loved the simple excitement of the color changing effects. One of our sticks had some trouble locking in place when it’s fully extended. I do wish they were just a little bit longer as my kids are still young and I get nervous if they get too close to the fire, but overall, these sticks were a fun addition to our campfire nights.
customer_reviews.author: Rysibbos

customer_reviews.title: part of the core for SMOREs
customer_reviews.text: EASY, no more burnt (on fire) marshmallows, cool/freeze the chocolate bar before using so the marshmallow will melt before the chocolate bar, and place some aluminum foil under just in case
customer_reviews.author: Standard Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gadget for the Fam
customer_reviews.text: This was part of a b-day gift for my brother. He loves fishing and hanging out with his family at their vacation home. He got a kick out of these (I bought him two). He popped one out of the package right away. They seem to work well. The fork extends pretty far out. Just be careful setting the hook. lol. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ciardo

customer_reviews.title: Cool for kids (and adults)
customer_reviews.text: My boys love fishing and love smores even more! These things have lasted for 3 months with 6 and 8 year old boys that are not exactly gentle with anything. They make roasting marshmallows fun and easy for them, plus they get a lot of "those are cool" comments from the adults at our lake house.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Glamping with S'More to Love!
customer_reviews.text: These skewers are sturdy and telescope easily, no fear that food was going to fall off or that the skewer would droop. Obviously they may be used for many foods and not just marshmallows. Our first use was with hot dogs - a little "glamping" right in our kitchen. It was raining and we wanted to test them out. There are 5 45" telescoping skewers and each has a unique handle color - red, blue, yellow, black and green. They also have little red rubber caps for the skewer ends. I do wish that this set came with a storage bag/case, something other than just the box. And also need to add that it shipped the same day I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun S'mores gadget
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far but really liked it. Agree with others that it's a little hard to determine the exact right about of time to leave them in the oven, but overall, the s'mores were great. I made the mistake of flipping the whole thing over again when I took them out of the oven. That was a little messy, and I realized after that I didn't need to flip it to open it. Excited to use it again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fisherman who likes to camp out.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the Fishman his extra camp out I bought it for my grandson to give it to my son for Father’s Day and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Soon2b62

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to keep them straight when building them, and crackers start to burn around the edges before chocolate and marshmallows get soft. But it was a big hit at the family cookout we had.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Smore to love!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. The only thing is. You can really shut the latch when you have big marshmallows (standard size). Once we switched to smaller marshmallows it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Sum Mores
customer_reviews.text: bought this after seeing it on UNCRATE... make sure you put some heavy foil underneath as it gets messy. marshmallow and chocolate were all over the grating and i thought i was just going to pitch it after the first use, but to my surprise, everthing cleaned off very easily!
customer_reviews.author: LLW

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. It's a fishing pole for marshmallows or hotdogs. I already had one and the kids fight over who gets to use it. So I bought a few more - so everyone's happy - including me!
customer_reviews.author: chood

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: We liked the snore sticks. They extend long enough to bake them easy to use for young kids. They are easy enough to clean (although I was careful with the lighting parts). The color changes make it a bit more fun, although I’m not sure if it’s comoletely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Shelleye02

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed that this product did not work. We were camping and gifted this item to our 8-year-old and the tool did not telescope out, it only rotated. She still added marshmallows to the ends and just saw them fall off a couple of times into the campfire. I suggest making the fork part a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: anaraquel macias

customer_reviews.title: Super fun S'More makers
customer_reviews.text: Super fun S'More makers! My granddaughters absolutely loved the color changing sticks, and they are long enough that they won't get hurt making their own marshmallow treats. I highly recommend these to anyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Clean me quick
customer_reviews.text: A little messy. And cleaning should be done immediately after use. Don't soak it overnight... works well and is a hit
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Practical!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and practical. My kids (1 & #3) love using these at the bonfire. The extension works great and the lights make it so much more fun with my kiddos. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: MplsGal

customer_reviews.title: Must have camping item!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased for camping and as a gift and they are great! Such a fun and easy cooking tool for camping and fires. Held food great and is easy to clean as the rod is removeable. No rust after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tifighter

customer_reviews.title: S'mores all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Having had to put off planned backyard S'mores several weekends in a row due to inclement weather, I was happy to find this little devise. I was able to make S'mores in the oven on a rainy night so the kids were happy. Easy to use, easy to clean. We did need to cook a bit longer than they mentioned, but perhaps we like our marshmallows more melted. Overall we are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Best marshmallow roaster ever purchased. Wish the rod secured inside the real and did not fall out often
customer_reviews.author: Austin Emery

customer_reviews.title: It’s great! Loads easily
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times since purchasing. It’s great! Loads easily. Cools quickly. Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy KellyGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Roaster
customer_reviews.text: Works great for camping. Just put your weenie on it and slowly turn over an open fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and everyone that sees them adores them! I would note however, that the sticks pop out for easy cleaning, but I feel they come loose a little too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for the S’mores Lover!
customer_reviews.text: The gift recipient loved this! Asked where I bought it. Such a unique gift!
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift to someone who loves s’mores
customer_reviews.text: I gave this for a Christmas gift to someone who LOVES s’mores. Don’t know how well it works, but She liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Hit of the night, everyone wanted to use these ones!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Fun....... when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Broken on first night... fun for (2) smores, but costly for just those two snacks before someone stepped on it...... I should not of given one of the smores to the kids...... all for me next time
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the kids think it's hilarious. Win Win.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for serious s'mores maker!
customer_reviews.text: You will love this! It's a must for serious s'mores roasters! You'll get the perfect mallow without turning your roasting stick endlessly over the hot fire. It's a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We love to do campfires and doing smores. We can't always have campfire, but now - we can always have smores! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The cages for the s’mores not quite large enough. The crackers kept breaking. Disappointed that we were unable to enjoy our treat as anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Don't scoff at the S'more reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel was given as a gag joke last year. After camping during the summer with it, we purchased 7 more as gifts for friends this summer. For real, this reel when turned slowly creates the most perfectly roasted marshmallow. I paired the reel with the makings for s'mores for the perfect, fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes ok tasting s'mores but the cooking method makes them ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes ok tasting s'mores but the cooking method makes them incredibly messy to hold as the chocolate and marshmallow squirt out from between the crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey St Aubin

customer_reviews.title: No worries of little one going up in smoke
customer_reviews.text: Nice device, is it worth it is subjective and for me it was nice to keep everything clean and keep little hands from trying to place smores in an open flame. Just make sure you get the cracker the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: UniqueFlips

customer_reviews.title: Killin’ the S’more game!
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This thing is the BEST! My husband got it for me to use in our fireplace. It makes amazing marshmallows! Its just super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super simple
customer_reviews.text: It was so simple and yet so amazing to my kids. They all loved that they no longer needed to wait for a campfire to have s'mores. Super easy to clean, especially if you place it on an empty cookie sheet to catch any oozes.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer cook outs
customer_reviews.text: Omg this was awesome! Made watching movies at home more fun. Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect useful gag gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift to a co-worker that camps frequently, he loved them more than his kids! They didn't hold up the best, but they were a cute and corky gift
customer_reviews.author: Sky k.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to see the grandkids faces at camping this year!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clinton

customer_reviews.title: perfect grilled smores
customer_reviews.text: Used this weekend and works like a champ. I would recommend spraying with some nonstick spray. We enjoyed them and look forward to grilling more S'mores.
customer_reviews.author: Erika N.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea and a great idea for camping trips with kids!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping and easy to use! I have twin 5 year olds and they were a hit for them, but also for everyone else that we were camping with!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Adams

customer_reviews.title: they Rotate around and are extendable by hand
customer_reviews.text: metal bent when heated by fire. :( but other than that they were easy and fun for everyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Clenin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are Christmas gifts, I hope they are well received.
customer_reviews.author: cathyann25

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It arrived super quick and in perfect shape.It works great for S'more!!
customer_reviews.author: Delwyn Shelley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good value
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun to use and makes it easy to cook the food evenly
customer_reviews.author: chester's tools

customer_reviews.title: Only marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be wonderful for the campfire. Only use is for marshmallows. Was going to use for hotdogs also but the fork is to small. You'll have to stand very close to the fire. Not great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Kids love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: The kids think they are amazing and have fun using them. Not much else to say, mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great on the grill to make perfect smores put marshmellows ...
customer_reviews.text: works great on the grill to make perfect smores put marshmellows on the bottom first i bought 2 sets fun for the entire family kids love the
customer_reviews.author: Terry HookerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice for camping these days, when camp fires are not allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as an auction gift. I never got to use it myself. It is something I would like to have of my own
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Feist

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used it while camping. It was easy to set up but hard to open after, handle was hot. Took a while to get the s’mores out. Other than that kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanny Isa

customer_reviews.title: Melted in campfire
customer_reviews.text: This item melted in the campfire the 1st night. We didn't use it right away, so when it melted it was too late to send it back. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works, not as user friendly. Better be a contortionist to get started
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alan

customer_reviews.title: Roaster
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the plastic reel but it serves it's purpose, I think a wooden reel would have been a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cluckey

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, not very useful
customer_reviews.text: A fun idea, but not worth the work. You can't really pile your Smore's high with this, or the top won't close. Even when we made just basic Smore's, the graham crackers would toast and the chocolate melted, but the whole thing just kind of made a mess.
customer_reviews.author: BizzyBee

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution when Camp Fire not an option
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. No fuss. No mess...easy to clean. Did not need a campfire to enjoy great s'mores at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: moellis

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift. The box is so damaged, I will need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kuchina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It could have been better and definitely too generalized but I got what I wanted to get.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Surprised my guests with this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy for anyone enjoying a campfire. I made Smores at our summer camp and everyone was surprised and impressed with my Smore Maker. Very easy to assemble, dissemble and wash. Really a great product and worth buying for the looks on your guests faces if nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: LINDAWV

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Harder on a campfire
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Harder on a campfire, than in an oven. Nice for larger groups.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Giffen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Made a lot at one time. No waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! And the marshmallows are crispy on the outside and gooey on the inside just like they would be if you roasted them over a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Dfurry

customer_reviews.title: My niece's family will surely enjoy this item
customer_reviews.text: My niece's family will surely enjoy this item, but haven't used it yet to give an honest opinion of how] it really worked.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect marshmallows huge hit Labor Day weekend with the in laws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a HIT at our Yankee Swap Christmas party!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: same taste, less mess.
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly in our toaster oven. We had to adjust the rack height a bit to get an even toast on both sides, but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, good instructions and very good results.
customer_reviews.author: HippieMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly toasted and melted. We used it on the fire pit while camping.
customer_reviews.author: lisa johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Although messy to eat, the taste is absolutely delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Chad C.

customer_reviews.title: She said this product is great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a christmas gift for my cousin, since she loves camping. She said this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: chang

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good way to prepare a messy product. Kids liked using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Cool little gadget. If you love smores like me this is a great option when you can't have a campfire, and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, took some time to figure out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, took some time to figure out the best method to flip and rotate without ingredients shifting but I love it. Bought a 2nd as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wojtanowski

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: great item love it but boxes came damaged kinda a bummer cause I was giving one as a gift I do like the product though very easy to use with young kids
customer_reviews.author: c c

customer_reviews.title: It's just not the same.
customer_reviews.text: It will do in a pinch but I wasn't to I to it. First off when u build the snores the marshmallows are solid and it's hard to get them to stay up right when you close the container. They're missing some of the flavor. Next time I'll use fluff because that's what the marshmallow melts down to. Not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: FireFoxxZ28

customer_reviews.title: S'mores anytime of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I'm in the mood for S'mores, I no longer have to wait for the weather to be perfect for a bonfire. I just take this out & make the amount I want!
customer_reviews.author: Loni E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Put it on the grill and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is really cool, it doesn't beat roasting a marshmallow over the fire though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: my Husband purchased this s'more maker and it worked out great for making s'mores at home! They don't slide like they do in the microwave when you make them at home. the cracker stays nice and crunchy and the s'mores turn out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing! Easy - a child could fill it while an adult loads the s'mores into the oven. (Not to say that it's just for kids!) Plus, the manufacturer provides a list of ideas for other easy types of s'mores so you can experiment.
customer_reviews.author: dolphin15

customer_reviews.title: Better than a camp fire?
customer_reviews.text: A great contraption. Heats evenly and actually melts the chocolate. A really cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My husband was excited about this gift. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was excited about this gift. It was an unexpected surprise. He hasn't used it yet, but is looking forward to, when the weather gets warmer. Very clever idea.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smores!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that keeps a messy product clean. Great for small children and fun to use in the house.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you are making numerous s'mores at once!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, Amazing product and very eazy easy to use, which means it appropriate for all ages. except the oven part which should be supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of smore cookers out there but this one is the best. Easy to use, nicely designed and made. My family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is ONLY for your oven or grill! Do not try to use camping with a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsha Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: this is a good gift for any party hostess with kids involved. it's simple, organized & easy to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for a s'more lover. She really enjoyed it. It allows the Grahams to also get warm and crisp. Try it with Reese's cups instead of Chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family night, less mess
customer_reviews.text: For those that enjoy a good smore and want less hassle / or greater ease of making at home, this product does a great job. The kids and adults all love the finished product!
customer_reviews.author: Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Year-Round Smores!
customer_reviews.text: The fun part of smores is melting the marshmallow over an open fire. I realize that. For pure convenience though, the Cuisinart Smore Maker is AWESOME! Build the Smore, close the cage, melt on either a BBQ or in the oven. 6 perfect Smores within minutes. We have one at our cabin, had to purchase another for home. FYI, leftover, cold smores are great too. Taste like Moon Pies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sumaoang

customer_reviews.title: Works Great over and over
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to enjoy S'mores out of season when i fire pit is not readily available. Doesn't leech any chemicals onto S'mores when heated and cleans off easy, each time it's used. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron King

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a messier way to make S'mores!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to load, the Graham Crackers are toasted, the chocolate melts all over everything and the contraption is hot as hell and has a tendency to pop open when removing from the grill. The dogs love it, me not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for campers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift for someone who was going camping! It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, father, son & Son in law. Neat and works well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Langer

product_meta.title: S'more to Love STL-611 Six-S'more Maker
feature_bullets: Perfect s'mores anywhere in just 5 minutes
Easily stacks 6 s'mores and securely locks them into place for cooking
Perfect for indoor treats - use in your over or toaster oven
Great on the barbecue - no need for a campfire
Easy clean-up with soap and a non-abrasive sponge
